<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/seedbundle/#a75a54304c99ee264027c946c229d2ab6"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;Instruction &#42;&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/seedbundle/#a75a54304c99ee264027c946c229d2ab6">SeedBundle::getSlice</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> StartIdx,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                             </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MaxVecRegBits,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                             </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ForcePowerOf2) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Use uint32&#95;t here for compatibility with IsPowerOf2&#95;32</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// BitCount tracks the size of the working slice. From that we can tell</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// when the working slice&#39;s size is a power-of-two and when it exceeds</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the legal size in MaxVecBits.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint32&#95;t BitCount = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint32&#95;t NumElements = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Tracks the most recent slice where NumElements gave a power-of-2 BitCount</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint32&#95;t NumElementsPowerOfTwo = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint32&#95;t BitCountPowerOfTwo = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Can&#39;t start a slice with a used instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(!<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/seedbundle/#a2fb177e5ac1738fdc4dd1dfc2bf619b2">isUsed</a>(StartIdx) &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Expected unused at StartIdx&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> S : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a341215803e83773a3e97860dc291f121">make&#95;range</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/seedbundle/#a5df5d71163f4407f8d995939b4c5993a">Seeds</a>.begin() + StartIdx, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/seedbundle/#a5df5d71163f4407f8d995939b4c5993a">Seeds</a>.end())) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Stop if this instruction is used. This needs to be done before</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// getNumBits() because a &quot;used&quot; instruction may have been erased.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/seedbundle/#a2fb177e5ac1738fdc4dd1dfc2bf619b2">isUsed</a>(StartIdx + NumElements))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint32&#95;t InstBits = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/utils/#a880037a6ce1e268642581425f4f44c5f">Utils::getNumBits</a>(S);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Stop if adding it puts the slice over the limit.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (BitCount + InstBits &gt; MaxVecRegBits)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><span class="doxyHighlight">    NumElements++;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><span class="doxyHighlight">    BitCount += InstBits;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ForcePowerOf2 &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6dec2b5d3e04b47adf4d918d678e81c9">isPowerOf2&#95;32</a>(BitCount)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlight">      NumElementsPowerOfTwo = NumElements;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><span class="doxyHighlight">      BitCountPowerOfTwo = BitCount;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ForcePowerOf2) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlight">    NumElements = NumElementsPowerOfTwo;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlight">    BitCount = BitCountPowerOfTwo;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Return any non-empty slice</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NumElements &gt; 1) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((!ForcePowerOf2 || <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6dec2b5d3e04b47adf4d918d678e81c9">isPowerOf2&#95;32</a>(BitCount)) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlight">           </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Must be a power of two&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;Instruction &#42;&gt;</a>(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/seedbundle/#a5df5d71163f4407f8d995939b4c5993a">Seeds</a>&#91;StartIdx&#93;, NumElements);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlight">      StoreSeeds.erase(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LI = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;LoadInst&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlight">      LoadSeeds.erase(LI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Actually collect the seeds.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> : &#42;BB) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/storeinst">StoreInst</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;StoreInst&gt;</a>(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CollectStores &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sandboxir/#a3019002eb2b04987eae4158ac938245e">isValidMemSeed</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlight">        StoreSeeds.insert(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/loadinst">LoadInst</a> &#42;LI = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;LoadInst&gt;</a>(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CollectLoads &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sandboxir/#a3019002eb2b04987eae4158ac938245e">isValidMemSeed</a>(LI))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlight">        LoadSeeds.insert(LI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Cap compilation time.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (totalNumSeedGroups() &gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sandboxir/#a89201844d1c5cc37bbab4c1179f18b9e">SeedGroupsLimit</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/seedcollector/#a6201643830489323548830a4cc800e37"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/seedcollector/#a6201643830489323548830a4cc800e37">SeedCollector::~SeedCollector</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Ctx.unregisterEraseInstrCallback(EraseCallbackID);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"></CodeLine>
